import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:8000/api/v1',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add a request interceptor to add the auth token to headers
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// Add a response interceptor to handle 401/403 errors
api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{if(error.response&&(error.response.status===401||error.response.status===403)){localStorage.removeItem('token');// Avoid infinite loops if we are already on home page
if(window.location.pathname!=='/'){window.location.href='/';}}return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
